overview.title: Getting started
overview.content: Learn how to explore the template and access the core workflows.

sections.title: Sign in or create an account
sections.content: Use the Register or Login actions on the homepage to begin evaluating the experience.

sections.title: Explore the main dashboard
sections.content: After signing in, visit the main dashboard to access account management tools.

sections.title: Use the help menu any time
sections.content: Open the help icon in the header to revisit these guides when you need a refresher.

settings.title: Profile settings
settings.content: Manage your personal information, company details, and preferences.

sections.title: Update personal details
sections.content: Edit your name, location, and contact information directly from the account page.

sections.title: Manage company data
sections.content: Administrators can update company information, addresses, and timezones when needed.

sections.title: Stay informed
sections.content: Review credits, metrics, and other account insights to keep your workspace healthy.

security.title: Account security
security.content: Keep your account safe with verification and password controls.

sections.title: Verify your email
sections.content: Complete the verification flow to activate key account actions and notifications.

sections.title: Rotate passwords
sections.content: Use the password section to update credentials regularly and meet security requirements.

sections.title: Monitor sign-in activity
sections.content: If you notice unusual activity, update your password and contact support immediately.
